about.details:
Incorporated in 2016, Sancode Technologies Limited develops API-based software platforms and solutions.

The company provides easy-to-implement pre-built business logic and solution workflows for clients in digital transformation, workflow automation, Artificial intelligence (AI), Machine learning (ML), Robotic Process Automation (RPA), and Data Analytics, Metaverse, and Web3 applications, System Integration areas.

Sancode Technologies undertakes offshore software development projects, digital transformation, cloud migration, advance analytics, Robotic process automation, machine learning, and AI projects including those in emerging niche segments like Internet and Intranet website applications, enterprise solutions software, resource planning, e-commerce, value-added products and other business applications for corporations across the globe.

The company's customer base sits majorly in the United States of America which includes clients from manufacturing, FMCG, banks and financial institutions, retail, and real estate.

faqs.question: What is the Sancode Technologies IPO?
faqs.answer:
Sancode Technologies IPO is a SME IPO of 1095000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹5.15 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹47 per share. The minimum order quantity is 3000.

The IPO opens on March 31, 2023, and closes on April 6, 2023.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Sancode Technologies IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Sancode Technologies IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Sancode Technologies IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Sancode Technologies IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Sancode Technologies IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Sancode Technologies IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Sancode Technologies IPO opens on March 31, 2023 and closes on April 6, 2023.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Sancode Technologies IPO?
faqs.answer: Sancode Technologies IPO lot size is 3000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,41,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Sancode Technologies IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Sancode Technologies IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Sancode Technologies IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Sancode Technologies IPO will be done on Wednesday, April 12, 2023, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Monday, April 17, 2023. Check the Sancode Technologies IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Sancode Technologies IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Sancode Technologies IPO listing date is on Tuesday, April 18, 2023.
